short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cosmetic improvements to the Talking Parents webpage talkingparents.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For users of the Talking Parents website, this extension improves the formatting. In particular, you are able to print conversations with a nice format.
